none: 兵庫県荒川神社の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Arakawa Shrine  , Hyogo (Original)

荒川神社様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。 表示 - 非営利 4.0 国際： https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/deed.ja・We would like to thank Arakawa Shrine for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive. CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
兵庫県姫路市井ノ口437・437 Inokuchi, Himeji City, Hyogo Prefecture
長谷川百山門人・Disciple Hasegawa Hyakuzan
